column4: orga: when i try to conenct to myself on port 21 it asks for a password
ive got a problem, every time i try to login i get the error saying GDM could not write to my authorization file and thyat this might be because my disk is full
is there any way i can fix this
is your disk full?
ok perhaps empty your trash
kill gdm and log into the console
press ctrl alt F1
then log in and do "sudo /etc/init.d/gdm stop"
then do "rm ~/.Trash/*
how ya getting on
be careful with rm -rf, you don't wanna remove something important ;)
you killed gnome right?
ok don't get distracted
rm -rf ~/.Trash/* will remove all of it
but BE CAREFUL
just do the commands which we have said and it will be fine
cancel that with CTRL C
then do that command
it is a full stop not a comma, and a star not an 8
omg
ls -a to see your home directory
you may have lost some vital stuff in your home directory
but i doubt you've deleted the whole thing surely
